contactDetailsShortcut.title: Contact Button on Edit Opportunity
contactDetailsShortcut.description: When the Opportunity Details is open, this adds a button to go to the Contact Details.

menuFix.title: Dropdown Menu - Only One Allowed Open
menuFix.description: The menus currently allow for all to be toggled open at the same time. This closes all other menus when opening a new menu.

saveButtonFix.title: Contact Fixes: Save Btn & Date Fix
saveButtonFix.description:
Date Fix:(new!) Allows you to manually type or copy/paste a date instead of having to use the picker.
Save Button Fix: When editing contact details, the button appears at the bottom of the page and it's not obvious that the user needs to hit save. When enabled, this will move the save button to the top of the contact details so it is obvious.

autoSave.title: Contact Details - Auto Save
autoSave.description: Allows you to toggle autosave so it would automaticall save the changes instead of clicking the save button

additionalInfoSearch.title: Additional Info Search
additionalInfoSearch.description: Adds a search textbox in Additional Info to search any key

addFavicon.title: Custom Favicon
addFavicon.description: This overrides the default favicon which is a squished version of your logo. Upload your image file to a site like publit.io (free) and paste the link here.

lastLogin.title: User Last Login & Auto Logout
lastLogin.description: Displays the date of last login for users on the account and agency team pages. Also lets you set a timeout for auto logout.

updateTitleTag.title: Update Title Tag with Page, Notifications & Location
updateTitleTag.description: This updates the title tag according to the page that you are currently visiting rather than having all pages being the same.

notificationSettings.title: Enable Notification Settings and Sounds
notificationSettings.description: Add notification settings to allow for sounds, badges & message bubbles. Note: More notifications under the Title Tag setting.

opportunityTags.title: Opportunity Tags
opportunityTags.description:
For each tag assigned to an opportunity, this will add a class to the opportunity card. Example - if the contact has a tag of "Hot", it will have a class added: 'tag-hot'. Example CSS in GHL Solution Library.

Opportunity Tag Styles (GHL Solution Library).

opportunityCallButton.title: Call Button
opportunityCallButton.description: Adds a call button to the modal when viewing an opportunity. This will call the contact's phone number.

messageActions.title: Email Statistics in Conversation View
messageActions.description: Show if the email was delivered, opened or clicked in the Conversation View.

triggerToggle.title: Turn Trigger Folders On/Off
triggerToggle.description: This adds On/Off buttons to each folder in the triggers that allows you to turn all triggers inside each folder on or off.

campaignToggle.title: Turn Campaign Folders On/Off
campaignToggle.description: This adds On/Off buttons to each folder in the campaigns that allows you to turn all campaigns inside each folder on or off.

twillioWarning.title: Disable Twilio Warning
twillioWarning.description: Hide or Show Twilio Warning for Account Users & Admis. This does not affect Agency Users annd Admins

driveLink.title: Enable Drive Links & Open in New Window
driveLink.description: This adds a Open in New Window button on the top right of contact fields that have a URL in them that says "Open in New Window". If the link is a Google Drive link, it says "Open in Google Drive". This integrates well with UploadToDrive.com.

compressedOpportunity.title: Compressed Opportunity View
compressedOpportunity.description: This adds a button that lets you toggle a compressed view on the Opportunties Pipeline.

snoozeFunction.title: Snooze Contacts
snoozeFunction.description:
Adds a "Snooze" button in Contacts and Conversation view.
Requires: A Custom Date Field named "Snooze".
Requires: A Smart List that uses the Snooze Field.

Watch the Set Up Video

hideTriggerFolder.title: Protect and Hide Folders
hideTriggerFolder.description: By adding a custom suffix to your Trigger & Campaign Folders, you can protect and hide your intellectual property.

hideContactFolder.title: Protect and Hide Custom Field Folders
hideContactFolder.description: Add a keyword in your custom field folder to hide it from Account Users & Admins.

googleMapLink.title: View Map Buttons in Contacts
googleMapLink.description: This adds a button that lets opens a new tab to view the map for either Zillow and Google

filterNotes.title: Filter/Search Notes in Contacts
filterNotes.description: This adds a button that lets you filter and search notes in the contact details page.

opportunityDrag.title: Enable Click and Drag in Opportunities
opportunityDrag.description: The horizontal scrollbar can be too small for clients. This allows you to click and drag anywhere in the scroll area instead.

addressAutoComplete.title: Address Auto Complete
addressAutoComplete.description: Enables Google Address Auto Complete on the contact address under General Info

messagingUpgrades.title: Messaging Upgrades
messagingUpgrades.description:
Add intuitive interactions with the messaging area, expand the email compose area and change the overall style.

Video Walk Through and CSS for the Conversation Tags

unreadCounter.title: Unread Count
unreadCounter.description: Add an unread counter to the conversation menu item

taskCounter.title: Tasks Count
taskCounter.description: Adds a outstanding task counter to any custom Menu Item, Button or Header Button that links to tasks. It only counts incomplete tasks that are assigned to the user.

smartListsUpgrades.title: Contact Smart List Upgrades
smartListsUpgrades.description: Upgrades to the Contact Smart List Area. Refresh button allows a refresh to the contacts after an action like delete. More coming soon.

rememberPageSize.title: Remember the Page Size
rememberPageSize.description: Simple feature that just remembers the last used page size preference.

hideSingleLocation.title: Hide the Location Switch
hideSingleLocation.description: For users who are assigned to only 1 location, remove the location switch dropdown.

blurContactDetails.title: Blur Contact Details for Demos
blurContactDetails.description: Adds a hidden keyboard shortcut only for Agency Admins (CTRL+SHIFT+H) to blur the contact details for when you're demoing your SAAS.

contactImportAutoFill.title: Save Import Field Mappings for Contacts
contactImportAutoFill.description: When importing contacts, allow your users to save their field mappings to use again

collapsePipeline.title: Collapse Pipeline
collapsePipeline.description: Allows users to collapse pipelines by clicking on the heading. 'Clickup' style adds a white background to the header with a colored top border.

contactSearch.title: Contact Search
contactSearch.description: Adds a search box and enables to look for contacts

fbIntegrationCheck.title: Check for Expired FB Integrations
fbIntegrationCheck.description: This will display a list of expired FB integrations in the Agency Account area once a day and give you a link to trigger a check. Optional: You can send the expired integrations to a webhook as well.

userImportExport.title: User Import/Export Contacts
userImportExport.description: This allows ALL users to import and export contacts. If you need to disable this for certain locations, you can do so in the User Settings for that location in the customizer.

twilioAndMailgunIntegration.title: Twilio & Mailgun Integrations
twilioAndMailgunIntegration.description: This will display a form in the settings to allow Twilio and Mailgun Integration

addAccountNewWindowLinks.title: Add New Window Links to Sub Account Selector
addAccountNewWindowLinks.description: Adds a new window link to each sub account in the location switcher menu

calculateAge.title: Calculate Age
calculateAge.description: Calculate the age of a contact based on their date of birth

quickactions.subtitle: Add a new Contact from scratch
Book a new appointment in calendar
Send a review request to the customizer
Add a new Contact from scratch
Book a new appointment in calendar
Send a review request to the customizer
Add a new Contact from scratch
Book a new appointment in calendar
Send a review request to the customizer
